personalData.name: Harsh Mithapara
personalData.description:
Full Stack Developer and Data Science enthusiast with over 3 years of experience crafting high-performance web applications for international clients in diverse industries. Passionate about innovative problem solving and seamless user experiences, I specialize in React, Next.js, C#, Python, and a wide range of modern frameworks and databases. Whether building scalable platforms, optimizing site speed, or implementing AI-driven features, my goal is to deliver solutions that drive real results and make technology accessible for everyone.
Always keen to learn and grow, I love collaborating with global teams and using my skills to turn ideas into impactful products

education.degree: Bachelors in Computer Science and Engineering
education.university: A.D. Patel Institute of Technology, VVN (GTU)

education.degree: Bachelors in Data Science and Applications

achievements.name: Best Thesis Award
achievements.description: Recognition for Outstanding Research In AI Applications

projects.title: House-Services Management App
projects.description: PaaS web application developed using Python(Flask) and VueJS, along with SQLite Database. The application has role based Authentication and Authorization, and there are 3 roles, Admin, User and Serviceman.
